core.description: Describe the effects of untreated sewage and excess fertiliser on aquatic ecosystems
Describe the effects of non-biodegradable plastics, in both aquatic and terrestrial ecosystems
Describe the sources and effects of pollution of the air by methane and carbon dioxide, limited to: the enhanced greenhouse effect and climate change

supplement.description: Explain the process of eutrophication of water, limited to: increased availability of nitrate and other ions; increased growth of producers; increased decomposition after death of producers; increased aerobic respiration by decomposers; reduction in dissolved oxygen; death of organisms requiring dissolved oxygen in water
